name: Cat Game (Leek Games)
description:
A silly shooter where you play a cat-cow hybrid that has been infected with a mysterious virus. Spray infected milk at soldiers to turn them into your own personal zombie army, then use them to attack or bait more soldiers. Made for a game jam in about 12-14 hours.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

How to play:

  1. Basic movement : W,A,S,D 
  2. Jump : space
  3. Shoot : left mouse
  4. control zombie : right mouse
  5. Restart : R

Now let's explain what to do in the game:

You have to reach the end of the game without dying. You can turn soldiers into zombies and then control them. You control zombies by clicking on the ground with the right mouse button or by clicking on a soldier on the right with your mouse. When you do, the zombies will attack the soldiers or run to the point. If zombies are closer to a soldier than you are, the soldiers will attack the zombie.

There are 2 types of items. First the cat food, which heals and cat food, which increases the score.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Bugs and Errors :

This is not a finished game and will probably not get any further updates. As mentioned above, it was developed during a Game Jame. That said, there are a few bugs where we didn't have enough time to fix them. However, since we now want to focus on new projects, the bugs will probably not be fixed.  

Here's a list of bigs we've found, if you find any, just write it down in the comments.

  • Shooting doesn't really work on some PCs and we don't know why because it is different from PC to PC
  • A can of cat food goes crazy through the level and we just couldn't fix it

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Who worked on it:

  • programmer | Paul Neuhold
  • 3D artist / level designer | Maximilian Silwester
  • 2D artist | Junying Huang
